text: Irwin "Sonny" Fox (June 17, 1925 â€“ January 24, 2021) was an American television host, executive, and broadcasting consultant. He was the fourth full-time host of the children's television program, Wonderama. Fox died on January 24, 2021 from COVID-19 in Los Angeles, aged 95.Sonny Fox, TV Host Who Connected With Kids on 'Wonderama,' Dies at 95 The Hollywood Reporter January 28, 2021 ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Los Angeles Category:Television personalities from New York City Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Sonny Fox
